title: #153: Connecting the World | Peter Saddington
description:
Serial entrepreneur Peter Saddington stops by to describe his newest venture that seeks to connect the world through the Helium network: Emrit.

As the Internet of Things (IoT) grows and becomes a larger part of our daily lives, Emrit seeks to help people connect through their network and eventually use it to move into peer-to-peer transactions and localized banking.

It might be time to jump into the crypto game and learn as much as possible because this technology is not going away, and if used properly, just might change the world.
